name: Sgrizam
description:
The mission of this game consists in rescuing a princess who has been kidnapped by the evil inhabitants of the Kindos planet, whom, in addition, have robbed the fabulous treasure of the Imperial Palace. This assignment has been entrusted to you by Emperor Cophenix II, who promised to give you the hand of his gorgeous daughter, plus half of his possessions.

The adventure starts in the entrance of the Kindos castle, you will have to cross the different passages which lead to the jail Princess Doxaphin is locked up. You will have to avoid certain enemies and face others. You can duck, jump or pull out your sword to aim an accurate thrust at your adversaries. But be careful, all these movements have to be made with extreme precision. Otherwise you will lose one of your three valuable lives.

shot.caption: This screen displays as the game loads
This is the game's main / only menu. It gives the choice of keyboard or joystick. keys cannot be redefined. When all three lives have been lost the player is returned to this screen.
This is the start of Phase / Level 1. It's a short animated sequence showing the hero walking down the steps to face whatever's down here
The game begins. All sorts of things approach from the right. Contact with any one is fatal and costs a life
Of course he can jump over the low ones just as he can duck under anything that's flying
I did not find the sword useful against this kind of enemy but it could be that my timing is lousy
After avoiding half a dozen nasties and moving on to he right the player encounters this guy. As with the creeping / flying nasties, one touch from him is fatal
However this guy can be killed with the sword
